value:
$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Ice is so...so...so...slippery! Whoa!$k$pNow, spin, spin, spin around... Wow!
This is amaaaaazing!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|Be careful! You don't want to fall.$k$pEven though it's said that she has
lived longer than any of us, she still
acts just like a child...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|Dragons live much longer than we do.
She is no different.$k$pShe could live for thousands, or even
tens of thousands of years. It is said
to be a life almost without end...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|I know another dragon who has lived
a long span—Myrrh.$k$pTo live so long... I'm a little jealous, to
be honest.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|What do you mean, Ephraim?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|To walk the path of the warrior, to
live the life of a king... I can't do
both in the time I have.$k$pIt takes years—no, decades—of
focused effort to excel at something.
But even then, you have just begun.$k$pIf you could continue to hone
your skills for hundreds or
thousands of years...$k$pYou could maybe really achieve
something.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|Throughout history, many kings have
sought eternal life. And others have
tried to unlock its secrets...$k$pI understand what you mean, I think.
When I saw the endless shelves of
books in the palace library...$k$pEven if one was to spend their whole
life reading, there would be no way
to read them all. A shame, isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|All this means is that we must plan
our paths carefully. Don't you think?$k$pAnd I...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Come on, you three! Let's get going!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|Yes, let's. We must combine our
strength to defeat the enemy that
awaits us within the Tempest.$k$p

$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|The Tempest's foul presence has
dissipated. All is well.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Hee-hee! We did it! We make a good
team.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|You're right. We're good friends now,
aren't we?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|If ever you get the chance, please
come and visit Renais. We'll give you
a guided tour.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|I would be glad to take you up on
that offer.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Yep! I love to go on walks.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|Well, you're welcome anytime...
Eirika? What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|Oh, nothing, really. I was thinking
about what it means to live for so
long.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|What do you mean by that?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|We have become friends—for now.
But won't she get lonely, living on,
endlessly?$k$pLong after we are gone, her life will
continue. Inevitably, her memories
of us could become painful to her...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|I see...$k$pTo live on, losing friend, after friend,
after friend... To feel that sadness,
again and again...$k$pThis is what it means to live for such
a long time.$k$pI am sorry, Fae. I didn't think about
that. You've taught me something.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|I did?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|Our lives are fleeting. We must
choose very carefully what we will do
with the little time we have.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|It is true...but do not brood on it. For
the sake of your sister, if no one else.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|She's right, Ephraim! You've got to
grow up a little. Just the other day—$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|Yes, yes. I understand. Tell me about
it later. For now, it's time we leave.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|All's well that ends well! That's what
I like to see!$k$p
